DOC.brief_summary: To investigate clinical efficacy Osseospeed™ TX implant Chinese population evaluation marginal bone level alteration , implant stability implant survival posterior mandible 3 year load . Hypothesis : Early loading posterior mandible safe predictable procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Study OsseoSpeed™ TX Implants Chinese Population
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Provision inform consent 2 . Aged 2075 year enrolment 3 . History edentulism posterior mandible , Kennedy class I II , least four month . Last natural tooth function canine first bicuspid . 4 . Neighboring tooth plan bridge must natural root . 5 . Presence natural teeth , partial prosthesis and/or implant opposite jaw contact plan bridge . 6 . Deemed investigator adequate bone height bone width minimum 5.5 mm . 7 . Deemed investigator likely present initially stable implant situation Exclusion criterion : 1 . Unlikely able comply study procedure , judge investigator 2 . Earlier graft procedure study area 3 . Current need presurgical bone soft tissue augmentation plan implant area . 4 . Uncontrolled pathologic process oral cavity 5 . Known suspected current malignancy 6 . History radiation therapy head neck region 7 . History chemotherapy within 5 year prior surgery 8 . Systemic local disease condition could compromise postoperative heal and/or osseointegration 9 . Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus 10 . Corticosteroids medication could influence postoperative healing and/or osseointegration 11 . Smoking 10 cigarettes/day 12 . Present alcohol and/or drug abuse 13 . Involvement plan conduct study ( applies Astra Tech staff staff study site ) 14 . Previous enrolment present study . 15 . Simultaneous participation another clinical study participation clinical study last 6 month . 16 . Subjects unable give inform consent
